text: Ascendo very good place to attend the course. The trainer here all is friendly and helpful. Trainer Suzi is very good and helpful teacher. I learnt from her a lot of knowledge. I like the role play we conduct in class. Thank you teacher

Mr Johnathan Lim is very meticulous  in his lessons  teaching  both in English  and  Chinese languages.  He is also a very humble  n caring instructor who show great concern  for his students  welfare. Much appreciation  to you Mr Johnathan Lim  for your guidance on the course  lesson .

Ascendo is good school Trainer Suzi explaining very clearly and understand.
Role play she conduct in class was enjoyed and knowledgeable.I learnt a lot from Trainer.
Christmas Deco at Ascendo , is awesome. Teacher Suzi , she helpful and kind to students. I can see her very responsible and knowledgeable teacher. I will recommend friends to study at Ascendo

Today's session with Teacher Suzi was a great experience. I learned something new about how to handle customer trigger and provide service excellent to the customer. I learnt from teacher suzi alot of experience and knowledge in class
